archimate:Folder.name: Updating outdated packages you've installed
archimate:Folder.documentation: The coder codes, updating their package, leaving you in their dust unless you keep up. To find out if your installed packages are out of date, use the following command: $ npm outdated The report shows the current npm packages, the currently-installed version, as well as the current version in the npm repository. Updating the outdated packages is very simple: $ npm update express $ npm update
